tool_description:
this api give live information about World cup qatar 2022 
from differents newspappers
name: WorldCup_live_News
title: WorldCup_live_News

api_list.name: get news from individuel news source
api_list.description: get news about Fifa World Cup 2022 from specific papers news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://worldcup_live_news.p.rapidapi.com/news/telegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "worldcup_live_news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://worldcup_live_news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "worldcup_live_news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all the news about Fifa World Cup 2022
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all news about Fifa World Cup Qatar 2022 from different newspapers all over the world
api_list.code:
